We Provide a

A Multi-vector Approach To Culture

We Are Open For Any Kind Of Culture

We Share:

Reading Rooms

In addition to borrowing from us all kinds of books, you will also find quiet and spacious rooms for exploring your knowledge.

Computer rooms

There are also high-speed computers connected to the Internet. Our database also includes 80% of all paper works.

Lecture halls

We have five large lecture rooms and halls for debates and lectures. Every day you can come and find something interesting!

banquet halls

There should always be time for entertainment, which is why we have the 3 largest banquet halls in our possession.
